title: Story and Meaning, Story as Data Compression Device, Making Complexity Perceivable
description:
Owen Barfield, Saving the Appearances
Figuration, Alpha thinking, Beta thinking
Meaning and Data compression
Religion is whatever has class to being of highest value
The hierarchy that enables action in biological creatures
Dominance provides unity which provides meaning
Transjective is the union of the subjective and objective.
You are apprehending and at the same time, you are apprehended.

The Chosen by Chaim Potok, pain and suffering are a necessary part of the fabric of the world.

The hole in Like Stories of Old - Love is always self-sacrifice. Meaning on an individual scale is not meaning at all.
The feminine:  the mystery, the space, the question.
Women are selective maters so they drive the potential of the species.
Feminine - more than can be said:
The Mystery
The Space
The question

As a believer, the importance of vulnerability is highlighted.

The stories are all nested, like Russion Dolls.
The largest story has the most power to delimit.


Becoming Human, Reflections on Christian Anthropology
D. C. Schindler, Beauty and Transcendence
https://youtu.be/ei6eRK28oac
https://youtu.be/I-hdgbmMryE
